Address.label: Address
Address.value: 1400 DOUGLAS STREET, OMAHA, Nebraska, 68179, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Omaha, Nebraska-based Union Pacific is the largest public railroad in North America. Operating on more than 30,000 miles of track in the western two thirds of the U.S., UP generated roughly $22 billion of revenue in 2021 by hauling coal, industrial products, intermodal containers, agriculture goods, chemicals, and automotive goods. UP owns about one fourth of Mexican railroad Ferromex and derives about 10% of its revenue hauling freight to and from Mexico.
